#labels Featured
= Downloading, and running =

Download the zip file from the downloads section of the Javassonne site to a location on your computer. Double-click it to uncompress the download, and then double-click "Javassonne.jar" to test the file. 

If you have the current JRE installed for your machine, the app will run and display correctly.

Please post any issues to the [http://code.google.com/p/javassonne/issues/list Issues] section of the site.
